captions.text:
Listen to me.
Listen to me.

I'm gonna reach for
my badge, all right?

Who will have to take
the winner's place

She cannot fulfill
her duties is...

New jersey! Which means
our new miss United States is...

Don't take it.
Don't take the crown.

Stan: Like lady liberty,
she reigns...

Oh, yes, hold your crown
up high.

Director dave:
Get her off the stage!

Stan: Hold, yes,
hold your crown up high!

Women: ♪ she's beauty
and she's grace ♪

Stan: She stands
for all that's good.

Oh, she's beauty
and she's grace.

title: The Crowning Moment - Miss Congeniality (5/5) Movie CLIP (2000) HD
